scripts.security-test: k6 run SecurityTests/PortFolioSummarySecurity.js && xunit-viewer -r Reports/security-results.xml -o Reports/security-report.html
scripts.load-test: k6 run LoadTests/PortfolioSummaryMock.js && xunit-viewer -r Reports/load-results.xml -o Reports/load-report.html
